title: Poolparty Zoe should wear a two-piece it looks weird with a onepiece and a frilly shirt/skirt thing

embed.description: 6 New Chroma skins available for Pool Party Zoe.

body: or at least make a chroma with a two piece. her effects are great but it feels like someone went out of there way to cover her up. oh and let me make this clear since i know some people will get touchy about this subject, personally zoe is nether cute or sexy. curious does everyone like the the way the swimsuit looks?
